courses.Description: Basics of using HTML, CSS, and Javascript to create web sites.  Note: This cource has since ben modified.
Introduction to HTML, CSS, design concepts and the Document Object Model
Introduction to Javascript programming and using Javascript to interact with the DOM to modify web pages.
Principles of responsive web site design and how to create layouts.
An in-depth examination of Javascript features.

courses.Course: Bulding Responsive Real World Websites with HTML5 and CSS
courses.Description: Extensive exercises in building real-world websites.
Extensive introduction to the Go programming language.

courses.Course: Web Development with Google's Go Programming Language
courses.Description: Using Go to replace web server.  Includes use of Go templates and other features.
